question: Nai-êh tiâu-khoan ê chek-bū, bô kā choân-thé thiah-tiāu, tī 2020 nî ài siōng-kē ê hō-kè sī tah-iâⁿ?
2017 ni miâ kah 2021 ni miâ tiong, 'chūng-kî hāi-bōe ( 1 )' ê pêng-kun nî-chhiúⁿ hōa-kè sī siáⁿ-mih?
Sím chínn-sū ê koaⁿ-chè tòng-sū ê chek-jīm kòe-tn̂g ê tōa-sò͘ lóng-chóng iāu hō͘ kiâⁿ kàu théng-sî āu ê tōa-sò͘ sī siáⁿ-mih?
Tōaⁿ-chha̍t ê chham-ú kó͘-chá hāng-bo̍k ê hāi-sòan chha̍t ( 3 ) tī 2017 kah 2021 chi kan ê kîⁿ-á thè chìn-chêng ū siám-miáⁿ? I sī tēng-tēng ê bē?
answer: Tī 2017 chì 2021 nî ê kó͘-chá hāng-bo̍k ê hāi-sòan ( 3 ) ê kîⁿ-á thè chìn-chêng sī chin bē tēng-tēng, chin cheng-chah. Kîⁿ-á thè thàu-chū chió tī 2017 nî ê 2,444 chheng-ê goā, tī 2018 nî po̍k-cheng kàu 28,466 chheng-ê goā, cheng-chah kàu 2019 nî ê 5,737 chheng-ê goā, tī 2020 nî koh cheng chhoân kàu 11,598 chheng-ê goā, āu--lâi cheng-chah kàu siōng-chió ê 1,236 chheng-ê goā tī 2021 nî. Bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin tēng-tēng ê cheng-chhoân ia̍h-sī cheng-hā ê chīn-chêng.

question: Sio̍k-chè ê lūi-hêng, sèⁿ-chha̍t ê kim-á tī 2017 nî kap 2019 nî nn̄g tang lóng bē-tàng chhiau-kòe $3,000 chheng ê, ūi-tiāu lia̍t chhut lâi?
2018 ni nî ê choân-tē hē-tē ha̍p-iok chek-jīm tang-tiong, 'tn̂g-kî chè-chè ( 1 )' chiàm kí choán-tē sè-jīm ê pí-lē sī tán-chē?
Nāi-koán "ground leases" ê hōan-chîng tī 2017 nā-sī keh-lia̍t 20% tō siâⁿ siáⁿ-mih, hit nî ê sin ê "total contractual obligations" ē sī siáⁿ-mih?

Tùi sió-liōng ê koan-îng chè chioh ê chiong-sò͘ lâi koan, 'chóng-kiōng' chioh kap 'kî-āu' chi-chhù ê chiap-tōaⁿ ū bīn-téng ê koan-liân bē?
Chih-chí lí ê lí-iû.
answer: Bô chin bīn-téng ê koan-liân. Tùi kó-ì ê kóng-hoat lâi kóng, 'tn̂g-kî chè-chè,' siōng tōa ê chioh ($3,508,789 chi̍p), ū i ê chóng-liōng chhù ún 49.6% chiap-tōaⁿ hō͘ chioh. Tùi-chhiat lâi kóng, 'hoat-tián kap kiàn-siat backlog chài-liāu,' tē-it-ê tōa chioh ($344,700 chi̍p), kan-na ū ún 0.6% chiap-tōaⁿ hō͘ chioh. Tī chit ê sî-chūn, 'tē-bīn choán-choè,' chi̍t ê tiong-kan ê chioh, ū chiâⁿ koân ê phiah (89.1%) chiap-tōaⁿ hō͘ chioh. Chit ê bô-kāng-khoán piáu-bîng kái-ho͘ si̍t-kan bô kan-na i chong-thài ê toā-sè lâi thiau-chiat.

question: 表中哪一行是其他個別义务行的总和，这个总和适用于哪些列？
answer: “总合同义务”行是其他六个个体义务行的总和。这个总和适用于所有付款列，从“总计”到“此后”（B列至H列）。

question: 'Development and construction backlog costs' ê, siánn-chi̍t-ê nî ê hō͘-chîⁿ tùi 2018 kàu 2021 ê hō͘-chîⁿ lâi kóng, sī siáⁿ-chi̍t-ê chin tōa ê chha-pia̍t (outlier)?
2017 nî kàu 2021 nî ê choân-pō͘ contract admit kiūⁿ ê chi̍t-bān goân, sī siáⁿ-mih?
